name: Waterloo St Jacob Urgent Care Clinic
comment:
Urgent medical care * doctors and nurses assess and treat non-life-threatening injuries or illnesses that cannot wait for a family doctor

Services and programs include
  • family practice and virtual walk-in
  • blood work on-site
  • pharmacy on-site
  • in-house virtual specialist
